entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
